shapes

Class CommViewShape

  • java.lang.Object
    • shapes.PartyShape
      • shapes.CommViewShape
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.awt.event.ActionListener, java.util.EventListener
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    ActorShapeCommView, PartyObjectCommView

    public abstract class CommViewShape
extends PartyShape
    A class which represents a common interface for all the shapes in communication view.
    Author:
    Afraz Salim

        public CommViewShape(DiagramView diagram,
                     int x,
                     int y,
                     int width,
                     int height)
        A constructor to initialize the coordinates of the shapes.
        Parameters:
        diagram - The diagram of the shape.
        x - The new-Coordinate of the shape.
        y - The new y-coordinate of the shape.
        width - The given width of the shape.
        height - The given height of the shape.

        Parameters:
